displaytitle: Mao badge commemorating the 25th anniversary of the Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art
medium: 146 political badges of various shapes and sizes pinned on a T-shirt with a silkscreened image of Mao Zedong in pigtails by Zhang Hongtu
dimensions: badge: 1.85 cm. h (3/4 in.) x 2.6 cm. w (1 in.); overall: ca. 77 x ca. 90 cm. (30 5/16 x 35 7/16 in.)

titles.title: Mao badge commemorating the 25th anniversary of the Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art

texts.textentryhtml: Rectangular 1.85 cm. h. x 2.6 cm. w with rounded corners.  Gold (printed? Stamped?) design on white plastic.  Upper left = right-facing Mao in profile, wearing cap.  Upper right = “25”.  Under the # = view of hill with pagoda (?), arched bridge below.  Underneath Mao = “紀念”.  Along bottom edge = “在延安芝座谈会上的讲话发表”
–2009 Collection of Zhang Hongtu (Woodside, NY), by gift to the Princeton University Art Museum, 2009.

caption: Chinese, Modern period (1912–present), Mao badge commemorating the 25th anniversary of the Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art, [1967]. 146 political badges of various shapes and sizes pinned on a T-shirt with a silkscreened image of Mao Zedong in pigtails by Zhang Hongtu; 1.9 x 2.6 cm (image). Gift of Zhang Hongtu (2009-19.74)
